website_summaries.verdict: The Saucony Jazz Originals shoes are basically as comfortable as they are stylish. The midsole cushioning and the lightweight materials used in the uppers work together to provide a comfortable experience. It is a comfortable, vintage shoe that still works in some activities. This is easily a "steal" for sneaker fans.
pros: An overwhelming majority have given an almost perfect average satisfaction score to the Jazz Original shoes by Saucony
Many reviewers say that this model is one of the most comfortable shoes that they have ever worn
Plenty of people have mentioned that they loved the snug and comfortable fit of these kicks
A considerable number of wearers love how stylish this classic pair is
A lot like how light the Saucony Jazz Original sneakers feel
Despite the vintage look, customers say these Saucony Jazz shoes are “absolutely functional,” because they are supportive of many physical activities
A pair of Jazz Originals is quite affordable
More than half of those who have left reviews say that this model provides moderate arch support
Those who own more than one pair of Saucony Jazz Originals note that the quality is consistent
Custom orthotic insoles work well with Jazz Originals, a few buyers have remarked
cons: Some people are disappointed that the black ink from the suede of Saucony Jazz Original sneakers run into the white soles when the shoes get wet
A few users were disappointed with the shoe’s traction, particularly on wet pavement

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I have very low arches and shoes with a lot of arch support usually hurt my feet. Bought a pair of Saucony Jazz shoes about 20 years ago and remember thinking that these are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. I have never bought shoes online before but when I saw these on Amazon I thought I would give them a try. Very happy with my decision. They are still (for my feet at least) some of the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. One warning I would give to others is that Saucony shoes seen to fit a little small compared to others so I would recommend ordering a 1⁄2 size larger than you usually wear.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Browder4

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I've got a pretty flat foot that's a little wide with a high instep. These shoes fit me better than any others I've ever owned. They also hold up pretty well. The photos show a pair that's been worn almost every day for 3 years (black and silver) and a brand new pair that's been worn once (blue and yellow). Also super important: Prince Markie Dee is wearing Saucony Jazz Originals on the cover of the Fat Boys 1987 12" single Falling In Love.
customer_reviews.author: Rhythmical Mecca

customer_reviews.title: Run small, but classic!
customer_reviews.text: T do run small, but I love this classic look. I had a pair when I was young and have wanted the same style but these have some design differences. Like a mix of the Jazz and the Jazz Low Pro with a different tongue and tongue attachment. Also, the foam is a bit thick at the back and the glue job looks cheap. Nonetheless, an old favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Linc

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sneakers, just didn’t like the color scheme...
customer_reviews.text: I am an 8.5/9 depending on sneaker or shoe & these sneakers in a Men’s size 7 fit fine & are comfortable to wear right out of the box. In my humble opinion, I believe they looked a bit “manly”on me with the navy & silver colors, so I returned for another navy color scheme that has a pretty lavender & light blue color in it as well. Otherwise, these are great sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, light-weight shoes
customer_reviews.text: These were my first Saucony shoes. I bought them because I was looking for comfort as I am on my feet a lot during the day and the price for these was right around what I was hoping to spend. I've had them for about a month and am wanting to buy a few more as I like the variety of colors they offer. They are very light-weight, comfortable shoes and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Traverson

customer_reviews.title: Light weight super comfortable and 1980's looks.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these saucony jazz shoes. This is my go to pair of sneakers to just grab and put on with a pair of shorts and no socks. Leight weight, breathable and super comfortable. These are a perfect cheap pair for sneakerheads to romp around town in and stay comfortable walking all day long. I own 5 pairs in different colors to match what ever clothes I put on that day.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M.

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable shoes I've owned
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Shoes that are $50 (not on sale), make my feet feel like they are floating in two damn BOATS (in a good way), extremely comfortable. Only problem is, I like to go sockless (savage, I know) and notice that this shoe picks up odors quickly in comparison to other shoes. I solved the problem by spraying with anti-bacterial spray after wearing. They're not incredibly stylish, but pretty good- ASOS is selling them for $100, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Maeve O.

customer_reviews.title: My Saucony shoe and sole are different sizes. WTF
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 10.5 mens shoe and I noticed when I wore them they were tight but as a new shoes most need to be broken in. However I've been wearing Saucony for 20 years now and a few days later after work and my feet the most sore they've ever been i took them off and wondering why the hell they didn't fit, something dawned on me to look at the soles and sure enough the had a 10 size sole and the tongue tag said 10.5 I'm going to send them back and hope that Saucony or Amazon Make it right!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Maynard

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and comfortable fashion sneakers with wide room
customer_reviews.text: shoe is very lightweight, comfortable and great for summer. first impressions are great, let's see how it will work for long time. looks very cool on different outfits. Also note that if you have bunions this shoe is perfect for you, cuz it have enough room in front of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Rezo

customer_reviews.title: Great casual shoe...
customer_reviews.text: What a great shoe. I prefer the stance on these over the Low Pros. Some people may complain they're a bit more aggressive and that's where the LowPros come in, but I definitely like these more. I just wish there was a tad bit more arch support and so I use a different inner sole, but what are you gonna do. It's a casual shoe, but a great one.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Niewiroski Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the worlds greatest sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. Great for running and walking and all around a good sneaker. Great support and very comfortable. These regular jazz types are always spot on true to size. The thinner soled saucony runs a bit small. These however have always been nearly perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: They fit very well and provide excellent support for walking. You don't have to break them in or deal with an unusual fit. They are comfortable as I buy these similar shoes for children too. Saucony tends to last a while for both adult and children shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight to me
customer_reviews.text: Not to bad. Thought I would not like them that much but as I wore them, I do like them now. I ordered largest size avail. Would’ve liked them in the next size up and wider. But as the wife says that’s what a guy gets for only trimming his toenails once every two years. lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Saucony jazz I bought. These shoes are very comfortable but I do go 1/2 size up for Saucony; they tend to run just a bit snug for me. They look great and I get compliments on them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: SO SO shoe
customer_reviews.text: Materials are a lot cheaper than I expected.... Looks and feels like a cheap shoe, would have been fine if I spent $20... but for the price I expected more. Buy at least one size bigger than you need. Very little cushion not a good shoe if you are on your feet a lot or expect to do a lot of walking. Wont buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Person man

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite...of all the awesome retro originals. These are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S

customer_reviews.title: Laces are subpar
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great and are very comfortable. However the laces on these things are terrible. They don't stay tied unless you tie them in double knots which looks really lame. I know that I could try to find better laces for them, but who has the time for that? Ultimately I probably won't buy these again due to this fatal flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have a totally different fit than the Saucony Men's Shadow Original Sneaker. The shoe is very tight and very uncomfortable if you have anything other than a narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Pulaski

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pairs of these shoes. I have foot issues and have to wear a brace, and there seems to plenty of room in this shoe, I just order a size larger. It is a well made shoe, comfortable and wears well..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit,  priced right
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair of shoes as I'd previously owned another pair of Saucony shoes which were not only more comfortable than a leading popular brand but also durable. I will definitely buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Philbo

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. I've never heard of Saucony before I ran ...
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. I've never heard of Saucony before I ran into this particular pair and decided to purchase it after seeing all the positive reviews and a reasonable price. I usually go with size 7.5 with most of my shoes (Vans especially fit me perfectly) and this one was a perfect fit as well. I am a breakdancer, and I am extremely happy to have found a pretty durable but feather-light pair of shoes. Will definitely order another pair if my current one gets too damaged some day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably going in the trash
customer_reviews.text: I may have gotten a defective pair, there is a flap of fabric inside where the tongue attaches that is giving me a terrible blister. These are pretty much unwearable. No wonder they are so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great!  A little high for me..
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and looked great. Returned as I felt the sole might be too tall for me. I sprained my ankle recently and didn’t want to take a chance with the stability piece. Returned and opted for the low pro instead which is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Saucony never disappoint. The Jazz style is so comfortable, this is my third pair of them bought this year. I wanted an all-black shoe that would look good in both shorts and pants and these deliver. I love the "red" touch around the ankle for a little pop of color. Would highly recommend these for guys looking for both comfort and a cool style.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but the sizes run small
customer_reviews.text: I've always worn Adidas because they usually have good arch support and I know what to expect from the sizes. The Saucony size chart suggested I order my normal size. I did and then had to return them because they were small. I re-ordered a half size larger and they fit fine. I would like to add my own additional arch support but even with a half size larger, it won't 'fit'. I like the shoes a lot and will order another pair, but I will order a full size larger so that I can add additional arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G.

customer_reviews.title: Solid unchanged classic shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3d pair of these shoes. First pair I purchased in the early 80's for track n field. These shoes hold up just like they did 30 years ago and don't wear out as quick as some others that I have purchased from a certain big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Kalamity Flats

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of Jazz originals. I like these better than the low pro, they're more comfy for sure. My feet love these shoes! No more foot or knee pain after a 12 hour day on my feet at work. Not sure why I try other brands!! I wish they would come out with more color combos more often! I do find that they fit a half size small but they do relax after a few wears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to have in your collection.
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved them, as this is the ONLY shoe that he will wear for hours and hours working on his feet. Great leg, ankle, and back support.
customer_reviews.author: Kelz of course

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit my wider than average feet very well. For the price you wont find a better shoes, really. I ordered the navy blueones and they seem to go with jeand and shorts
customer_reviews.author: Luke D.

customer_reviews.title: Classic kicks. Toss the insoles.
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to shoes. Good fit, simple design, lightweight and well made. The only reason they're not a 5-star is because I have learned from my numerous pairs of these kicks that the stock insoles must go. I replace them with Superfeet and the midsoles seem to last much longer that way, but hey, you can do whatever you want. Your life is yours to live howsoever you see fit. I'm not here to judge you... just these killer kicks.
customer_reviews.author: T. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe Wrong Insole
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes, owned a few of these. Issue: bought a pair of size 13 shoes and received the shoes with one size 13 insole and one size 8-9.5 insole in the other. Not going to return them for a cheap insole but who is doing the QC before these deliveries go out? Purchased from Amazon.com Services, Inc.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Slattery

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like this traditional look of this shoes and good price.
customer_reviews.author: HN

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I’m on my 6th pair. I usually buy them a 1/2 size small because the break in and can become loose. I like my shoes snug. I usually wear 10.5 and hve been buying these in a 10 and it works out nicely.
customer_reviews.author: DJ MANIMAL

customer_reviews.title: A trip down memory lane but still good
customer_reviews.text: In the 1980s when I was an avid college runner, I owned several pairs of Jazzes and ran PRs in them. As far as I can remember they feel about the same, but I only use them once in a while for short runs. Their value these days is for all-day comfort and retro appeal for casual wear. It's really cool that these shoes are still available and I like the various colors they have now. I'll probably keep ordering these as needed as long they're around.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Kaziska

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: I used to manage a shoe store and tried many different shoe brands for comparison and feel. For the price, you absolutely cannot beat these tried-and-true shoes. Super lightweight, very comfortable and soft. I would compare them to wearing house slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Sirjury

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but had to buy 1/2 size larger
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of Jazz in the early 2000's and I loved them. They were my favorite pair of sneakers. Happy to find these again. I had to buy a half size larger than what I typically wear. Otherwise, they're just as I remember.
customer_reviews.author: rcole

customer_reviews.title: A modern classic
customer_reviews.text: As always these fit true to size, look good and are very comfortable. You can never go wrong with a pair of the Jazz's. It is my opinion that everyone should own three shoes 1) all white K-Swiss Classics 2) low top black and white Chuck Taylora 3) and of course Black and White Saucony Jazz! A must own no matter your style. You can never go wrong with a pair of these
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mendez

customer_reviews.title: ... narrow-ish heel and found early on which brands work best for me
customer_reviews.text: i was one of those lucky ones born with flat and wide feet and narrow-ish heel and found early on which brands work best for me: saucony, new balance, asics, and few others that i never got into (ie. brooks, mizuno). i use these for walking or low impact exercise, doesn't really matter to me that they're 'running' shoes. but what i like besides the fit, look, and flexibility is that they are sorta curved at the front so as to help with a normal walking/running gait.
customer_reviews.author: kiyo

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good fit
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience buying shoes online, and I'm very satisfied. I have big feet (15) so shopping in-store is a huge pain. These shoes fit just fine, they're very comfortable (I wore them working retail at a paint store with no sore feet at the end of the day) they are very lightweight and breath well, which also means they're not ideal for the cold. the glue holding the soles to the uppers was over-applied a little, so there's about 1/8 inch of glue showing on the upper near the heel. not much, and it just makes that spot look a tiny bit glossier. overall, very good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ben B

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I went half a size up but they seemed small at first and were hurting. I re-laced them and after that they felt fine. For $40 they are a good looking shoe. I use them for walking though as I need my stability support when running.
customer_reviews.author: C. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t try again
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were way to small and I even ordered up a size. Toes were crammed into the toe box, width was narrow and Cushioning was horrible imo. Really wanted to like these but unfortunately they missed the mark with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Sauconoy Jazz sneaker
customer_reviews.text: It's getting harder and harder to find stores that carry this shoe and the ones that do put a premium on the price. Living in a hilly city I find these shoes really help keep my feet comfortable and well padded as I navigate lots of steep grades. They also have a very stabilizing tread that keeps me safe on those hills. The price was good, the free shipping while it took a little longer was not that much longer for FREE. People look at the shoes with admiration and wonder what they are as they are not the standard sneaks you see out there. They are in a class of their own. Very good Experience for me.
customer_reviews.author: SneakerBuster

customer_reviews.title: This version of shoes are built for men and women
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are nice and well madeI bought these shoes for my son (teenager) who was happy to receive them, until he saw them worn by some girls. Well since then he is reluctant to put them and says that the style is not really masculine. Therefore I suggest adding in the description, whenever you are dealing with products built for both men and women, which is a unisex product. However, the shoes are cute and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Francesco C.

customer_reviews.title: Good "Knock Around " Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because I had plenty of running shoes and just wanted a casual shoe or dressy sneaker in black that I could wear to basketball games or to places I go with my kids, like museums and amusement parks. The price was right and they are comfortable and perfect for lots of walking. My wife doesn't dig them. She says they look like the Nikes Forrest Gump wore. That doesn't bother me because I liked Forrest Gump, but I am glad I didn't purchase red ones. lol!
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: The midsole is well made and hasn't lost shock absorption after a few months of daily wear (6'2" 225lbs). Fit could be narrow for some, but good for me. Recommend changing insoles, especially if you require arch support
customer_reviews.author: Krautmann

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had these shoes long, but first impressions are great. They fit perfectly and are very comfortable. Probably more so than any other shoe of this style I've ever owned. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Comfy stylish throwback shoe
customer_reviews.text: Has some good cushion but the tread on the bottom gets some getting used to. It’s very slippery on wet floors so be ware.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Felt light. Relieved some foot pain and discomfort after standing 6 hours at work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish shoe
customer_reviews.text: Stylish shoe. Just don’t expect them to be something you would wear for actual strenuous athletic activities.
customer_reviews.author: Skiracer47

customer_reviews.title: awesome shoes for great price
customer_reviews.text: I am male, age 28. I ordered the gray/blue size 12. (I'm normally a 11.5) after reading reviews about tight fit I ordered half size up. They fit like a true 12. Half size looser than I usually prefer but it was worth the gamble. They still fit comfortably and have already become one of my favorite pairs. Note* Sole of shoe is pretty stiff. I'm hoping it will break in some more with a few more uses. Can't beat the value for the price. If you are considering this pair for yourself or someone else I say go for it. They look great with jeans or khaki shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Smart, Stylish Choice
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend was a teacher at the time of purchase. Long hours on his feet in proper dress. I wanted something streamlined and dark while giving a hint of style. These are now his favorites and he wears them every day. Helped out a lot with foot and back pain.... but he was wearing 5 year old pumas prior to this purchase. I would buy these again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Vegan shoe priced very competivitely
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to beat for the price, and a very comfortable shoe too! It's hard to find Vegan shoes locally, so matching that with a pretty low price tag and I was sold. The fit is snug, but supportive rather than chafing. The laces were a bit on the short side, but I suppose I could've ordered a shoe size up and the laces might have some more slack.
customer_reviews.author: C. Felish

customer_reviews.title: These were great entry-level shoes
customer_reviews.text: These were an entry-level shoe purchase for me, to see whether or not I would actually enjoy running. I do, and I think I enjoy it more in these shoes. The support and cushioning are great, the fit is true to size and very comfortable, and I am (slowly) working my way from 1 mile to 2 miles per run in these shoes with no complaints at all; and they even come with two sets of laces!
customer_reviews.author: tratl1963

customer_reviews.title: Fits well with everything
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers you could wear them to the gym or you could wear them out with a nice pair of pants
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Great, dependable and affordable everyday sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how many pairs of these I've owned at this point - started wearing them about 15 years ago I think. I tend to buy a new pair about once a year (various color configurations) and wear the heck out of them until I can't wear them anymore. For the money, I think they're a steal on comfort, support and style. Generally i wear size 11, but I started buying a size too big of these because I find the 11 a little tight. 12 has a bit more room in the toe than i need but they're a better fit overall.
customer_reviews.author: C. Holford

customer_reviews.title: A classic!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved these shoes. They are a classic and they are comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: A Timeless Classic
customer_reviews.text: A couple of days ive had these suckers and ALREADY im getting compliments about how cool they look (black and white version). Looks awesome with a pair of joggers too. My feet are totally flat and it has caused me alot of pain in the arches and in the back, these shoes have helped alleviate alot of that pain and i can walk around in my new saucony's all day long without having to stand on the sides of my feet in pain like i used to. Buy them Asap.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Feet feels good
customer_reviews.text: I had my first pair in 1990 and it’s real comfortable and sexy on my feet
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Size change?
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this size of sauciony brand shoe for many years. They have always fit correctly and I have had no problem with them. However, this pair of shoes even though they were exactly the same size and name of previous buys. They were about 3/16 of an inch narrower than previous buys. I have not run in them yet but I am afraid that they will not fit correctly for running.
customer_reviews.author: wade

customer_reviews.title: Never Disappointed with Saucony
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers, VERY comfortable and stylish. Although they are mens they look nice on my feet. I am a nurse and I can walk 12+ hours and my feet feel wonderful... Highly recommended!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: tonya

customer_reviews.title: I knew he'd like them and i was right
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them for my husband, because I had a similar pair years ago. I knew he'd like them and i was right. Perfect fit and he feels stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Working in my feet all day has never felt so confortable!
customer_reviews.text: After trying so many brands of sneakers due to my arches having dropped from my feet.I tried these sneakers and fell in love with them. They fit true to my feet and I buy a pair every few months. Very comftable. I get a pair every couple of months. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal and it’s my daily wear🤟
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal and fits great ... love it .. old school style.
customer_reviews.author: Ko L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit - Most Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations for comfort. I have always liked Saucony shoes and this pair of Jazz might be my favorite. Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Boss Moss

customer_reviews.title: Recommend them
customer_reviews.text: Oh I love a saucony it's a great support tennis stylish too
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: A Blast From the Past!
customer_reviews.text: I owned these sneakers years ago, and have always described them as "walking on clouds". Recently, I needed a pair of sneakers for walking, and decided to see if they were still available~~~and, much to my surprise, they were! My original pair were men's, so I duplicated that purchase with these, and could not be more pleased with the comfort! I take a size 9 in women's, and the 8 in men's are a perfect fit and allow a little extra room!
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the feet
customer_reviews.text: I don't really get any compliments on my shoes and this is the first time I've received compliments from people of all ages (older and younger). They love the design.
customer_reviews.author: Israel

customer_reviews.title: Fashionably Comfortable, I just can't have on pair.
customer_reviews.text: I am not new to Saucony Jazz Originals. These as well as PUMA SUEDE are my go to Kicks for when I want to be fashionably comfortable. Saucony Jazz has just the right support and just the right comfort for all day walking or all day relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander V.

customer_reviews.title: Great cushioning, Same classic great Saucony quality!
customer_reviews.text: Same great quality as the first pair I bought over a decade ago. Notable: great cushioning, as I have observed of all the Saucony sneakers I have purchased . These are more ideal for fashion, wheras I have a more ergonomic pair of Saucony's for running.(Great for someone whose car is her 2 legs all day, every day!)
customer_reviews.author: tara5786

customer_reviews.title: Solid sneaker, would prefer different color
customer_reviews.text: Comfort-wise, there are 5-stars. I'm giving them 4, however, because of the color. They looks a lot better in the pictures than in person TBO. I can't wear them with as many outfits as I had hoped, but when I do, they are VERY comfortable -- possibly the most comfortable pair of sneakers I own out of about 15 or so.
customer_reviews.author: ThePiombino

customer_reviews.title: Darkhorse Climbing Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes actually do really well for rock climbing. They're the perfect "excuse" shoe. If you can't do a boulder problem, your friends will assume that it's because you're not wearing actual climbing shoes, and when you do send something, they will give you respect for doing problems in your tennis. Just be aware that constant bouldering in tennis shoes can and probably will lead to severe tendonitis. Buy them snug.
customer_reviews.author: M. I.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shoe! This is my second time buying the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe! This is my second time buying the Jazz, only because my last pair were in much need of retirement. It's great for running, comfortable/supportive for most physical activity and on top of that it has a very stylish look. I will be a customer for life, so long as Saucony continue to make this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: PhillipM

customer_reviews.title: I have been wearing these for years and suddenly with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these for years and suddenly with this pair, they are no longer wearable... There is decidedly less foam on the sole.. the toe area is also uncomfortable. I can't believe after 30 years, I am going to have to find a new brand to wear...
customer_reviews.author: Megan marra

customer_reviews.title: Classic comfort
customer_reviews.text: I've worn the Saucony Jazz for years due to their comfort and simple style. These shoes don't disappoint and I love the gray and orange, especially the orange sole. I use these daily as well as for working out. They fit true to size, as I've been ordering a 10.5 in this shoe consistently for years. Great, inexpensive, casual sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Colombo

customer_reviews.title: Old reliable
customer_reviews.text: Have these in numerous colors, good arch support and stylish
customer_reviews.author: Kilosh

customer_reviews.title: Little tighter than usual
customer_reviews.text: Love my saucony but these are a little tighter for some reason
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: The color and fit are true to advertisement. A little tight at first, but a lacing adjustment and a little wearing in has them feeling great now. Very comfortable and supportive sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Coral

customer_reviews.title: Nice kicks
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this classic sneaker, with subtle updates. They're trendy and super comfortable and breathe well. I owned the originals back in the 80's and love that they are back. While I ran with these back in the day, I now use "modern" running shoes for that, I wear these strictly casually.
customer_reviews.author: Tastinient

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: My son says these are very comfortable. They look great for their price point.
customer_reviews.author: Steph B

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have two pairs of sauconys in womens and they feel like pillows. I ordered a pair in mens, which are automatically wider than womens shoes, and they were tight on my baby toes. I can't believe this. I had to wear them as soon as I took them out of the box or I would return them! I can't work a 6 hour shift w/o pain. I need answers!
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Nice but you get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I bought were defective, the fabric upper started to come detached from the lower after wearing only 3 times. Amazon did a great job of replacing the shoes but I felt that even though I spent only like $26 on them, they should have not fallen apart so quick. They do look really slick though, black on black with white stitching. Nice vintage look to them.
customer_reviews.author: NOLAguy1982

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair at a Saucony outlet and have found them to be the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. I loved them so much that I bought another pair on Amazon, but I mistakenly bought the "low pro" version. For me, they did not provide as much support. I realized yesterday after wearing the originals for 13 hours, that I had no pain in either my feet or back. I had a slipped disc in my back several years ago. I wish I could buy these in every color!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Cambron

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a casual shoe that I could walk in for several hours for city walking, museums, airports, etc.. This works well for that. I run in Saucony shoes for roads and trails, so I knew the general fit of Saucony shoes, and this matches up. The toe box is slightly larger than many shoes, and the sizing seems true.
customer_reviews.author: PjMod10

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The first day i wore these all day, I had no complaints! They were super comfortable running errands all day and I loved the way they looked on my feet! I've spent way more on shoes in the past and have had far less comfort than what these provided for me.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes hurt my heels. I could feel a lump on the heel part of the inner shoe. I took out the insoles and could still feel it. Ended up returning them. According to mass reviews, seems like I got a defective pair. Which wouldn't surprise me because nearly all the bad reviews are due to glue and stitching errors in the manufacturing process.
customer_reviews.author: Janell

customer_reviews.title: super light, super comfy
customer_reviews.text: these have replaced my adidas sambas as my go-to shoes. if i were still waiting tables id want them for work, but not bartending as there are not waterproof at all. super light, super comfy. i used to have to use insoles in the sambas, but no insoles required for these. awesome shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: mitch dunkhousser

customer_reviews.title: Eye catching and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Solid shoes that perform reasonably well for running. I've done a 7mile run and a few 4.5 mile runs in these shoes without much of a problem. They're not the best running shoes for fast runners but they should work fine for a relaxed pace. The insoles are crap in every pair of shoes so I recommend an aftermarket insole such as superfeet green if you want to put some miles on them. They are definitely true to size. Since the white parts of the shoes are very crisp, they stand out a lot giving you a serious retro athletic look.
customer_reviews.author: M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Sauconys great daily shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fashionable shoe have had previous sauconys before so I know they’re good shoes used them as my beaters that can go with any style of clothes definitely recommend don’t offer to much comfort but if you know how the shadows are then ya know
customer_reviews.author: Chris Townes

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of these shoes, been rocking em for years.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Firmest sole I’ve had in a running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I would expect a softer sole and more arch support. These shoes feel like walking on concrete all day.
customer_reviews.author: Luke F Baker

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These Have to have the hardest sole ive ever felt. Very firm and very stiff. But they look good at least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the vegan
customer_reviews.text: So I bought the same style of shoe but it was the "Jazz vegan" and loved them, and thought I would give this guy a shot. The white bits are all a semi reflective plastic and just made the shoe feel/look cheap. Even adding a 'crinkle' sound if a i moved in a way that would cause the sides to bunch up. Go look at the vegan version. It is tan/beige where this shoe is white. The number of complements and the natural feel were amazing. The sole was thin on it so it was poor when walking on very rough terrain, but still an amazing shoe.
customer_reviews.author: J. McCracken

customer_reviews.title: Old school looks and price
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for the first two months then the foam started to wear. I am a big guy so I am rough on shoes as it is but these wore out faster than my typical NB sneakers. For the money I'm not too worried and they would provable be awesome for an average person but I will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Saucony lives up to its lasting company reputation for good running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Saucony shoes for years. I have ran in them for years. Trail,concrete,asphalt you name it they have always been able to handle anything. They aren't flashy or gaudy they are basic and durable. For a runner who expects quality from his running shoes Saucony has always exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: echall4

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the quality it use to be
customer_reviews.text: My favorite running shoe was Saucony. They lasted and were very well made. At my age, I no longer run, but walk. I noticed that the construction was less than what I expected, but being fair the price was a lot lower. So you get what you paid for. I order a size 12. My foot use to be 11 and is now about 10 1/2. The shoe fits perfectly, meaning by a shoe a few sizes larger.
customer_reviews.author: Cy

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for a good price, They dont hold up as well as the new balance comparable but they are 20 dollars less. The arch support is lacking so if you buy a pair you might want to pick up arch support padding
customer_reviews.author: G. Carleton

customer_reviews.title: Sauconys rule!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing the Jazz style for over 10 years and the fit has been consistent over the many pairs I have worn.
customer_reviews.author: kimmiejoan

customer_reviews.title: I ordered silv/blk. The box says silv/blk. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered silv/blk. The box says silv/blk. The picture under my orders was silv/blk. In the box was blk/silv however.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Kobz

customer_reviews.title: goes on my foot, fits as usual
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Jazzes for years, I don't have to try them on, I know my size and Saucony keeps them consistent, thank goodness because I have problems getting shoes that fit (feet half size apart). bonuses for this blackout version: with a straight-cut or wide leg dress pant you can get away with these instead of work shoes. comes with optional matching red laces [ caution, with black laces, can resemble orthopedic shoes].
customer_reviews.author: Orbital

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received authentic sneakers. I have been wearing these sneakers for work (central sterile processing) and absolutely love them. I order a new pair about every 8-12 months.
customer_reviews.author: Hek_87

product_meta.title: Saucony Originals Women's Jazz Original Sneakers
feature_bullets: Retro-inspired sneaker with soft mesh upper featuring comfort-contoured EVA midsole
